statements: SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM crop_field_mapping;
SELECT field_name FROM crop_field_mapping WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM crop_field_mapping WHERE longitude < -80;
SELECT field_name, latitude FROM crop_field_mapping WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -85;
SELECT latitude, longitude, field_name FROM crop_field_mapping ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_field_mapping;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM crop_field_mapping;
SELECT * FROM crop_field_mapping WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM crop_field_mapping ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crop_field_mapping;
SELECT * FROM CropFields;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM CropFields WHERE field_area > 100;
SELECT field_name, field_area FROM CropFields ORDER BY field_area DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM FieldOwners WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM FieldOwners INNER JOIN CropFields ON FieldOwners.field_id = CropFields.field_id;
SELECT * FROM CropFields WHERE field_area > 100 ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_info FROM FieldOwners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, ST_X(coordinates) AS longitude, ST_Y(coordinates) AS latitude FROM CropFields WHERE ST_X(coordinates) BETWEEN -180 AND 180;
SELECT owner_name, field_name FROM FieldOwners JOIN CropFields ON FieldOwners.field_id = CropFields.field_id WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT AVG(field_area) AS average_area, COUNT(field_id) AS total_fields FROM CropFields;
SELECT * FROM CropFieldMapping;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude FROM CropFieldMapping;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude FROM CropFieldMapping ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_period FROM CropTypes;
SELECT * FROM FieldStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM CropFieldMapping INNER JOIN FieldStatus ON CropFieldMapping.field_id = FieldStatus.field_id WHERE FieldStatus.status = 'Active';
SELECT CropFieldMapping.field_id, latitude, longitude, crop_name FROM CropFieldMapping INNER JOIN CropTypes ON CropFieldMapping.field_id = CropTypes.crop_id;
SELECT field_id, latitude, longitude FROM CropFieldMapping ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT status, last_updated FROM FieldStatus WHERE status_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_period FROM CropTypes WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Rice%';
SELECT * FROM CropFields;
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM CropFields ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT field_name FROM CropFields WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM CropFields JOIN FieldMapping ON CropFields.id = FieldMapping.field_id JOIN Crops ON Crops.crop_id = FieldMapping.crop_id;
SELECT worker_name, designation FROM FieldWorkers WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CropFields
SELECT field_name, latitude, longitude FROM CropFields
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit'
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, designation FROM FieldWorkers ORDER BY worker_id DESC
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_type ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_fields;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM crop_fields;
SELECT mapping_date, mapping_data FROM field_mapping WHERE mapping_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE mapping_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_date, soil_type FROM soil_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_fields ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM crop_fields WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM field_mapping JOIN crop_fields ON field_mapping.field_id = crop_fields.field_id WHERE mapping_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_url, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE mapping_id = 2 AND image_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM soil_analysis JOIN crop_fields ON soil_analysis.field_id = crop_fields.field_id WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND field_name LIKE 'Field%';
